code: import*as CryptoJS from"crypto-js";export var storageKey='EspacoPsicoEducar';export var SaveObject=function SaveObject(key,value){return SaveStorage(key,JSON.stringify(value));};export var ReadObject=function ReadObject(key){return JSON.parse(ReadStorage(key));};var Crypt=function Crypt(value){return CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(value,storageKey).toString();};var Decrypt=function Decrypt(cvalue){var bytes=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(cvalue,storageKey);return bytes.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);};export var SaveStorage=function SaveStorage(key,value){var cvalue=Crypt(value);try{return localStorage.setItem("".concat(storageKey,"::").concat(key),cvalue);}catch(e){return sessionStorage.setItem("".concat(storageKey,"::").concat(key),cvalue);}};export var ReadStorage=function ReadStorage(key){var cvalue="";try{cvalue=localStorage.getItem("".concat(storageKey,"::").concat(key));}catch(e){cvalue=sessionStorage.getItem("".concat(storageKey,"::").concat(key));}if(cvalue!==''&&cvalue!==null){return Decrypt(cvalue);}return false;};
